lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. Travis is in-transit, don't freak out. He'll be here in just a moment. He's making his way here from--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's busy this week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He couldn't stand to face Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we get into tonight's episode, let's go into some quick announcements. First and foremost, our fantastic returning sponsors for this campaign, our friends, our dear family at D&D Beyond. Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everybody, our trip to the UK changed us in a lot of ways. We were exposed to the European culture and that area of the world. We fell in love with it. Tonight, there's so much to talk about that I'm going to need some help. Everyone knows Matt's Scottish accent is top notch, but I've been studying with a dialect coach that I found on Craigslist and I think I'm ready to unveil my Scottish brogue. Now, because it's so accurate, Matt's going to translate what I'm saying. I'm going to be saying things in traditional, accurate Scottish about D&D Beyond that he'll translate into American English.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm weirdly on-board.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, here we go. (exaggerated Scottish accent) Hallo, ya bonnie lassies and laddies! Don't be a wee dafty. Ma kelly ann's been haverin how D&D Beyond is the maest braw app up tae hae though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pause, laughter) D&D Beyond is proud to announce the continuation of the Waterdeep campaign. Dungeon of the Mad Mage is out tonight at 9:00pm Pacific.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nae! I cannae be aff ma heed! It's Taps Aff cos eh D&D and Magic: The Gathering, ya numpty!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The long-awaited Magic: The Gathering / D&D crossover, Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, also drops tonight at 9:00pm Pacific time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Haud yer wheesht and nick it now or yer fit to be getting skelp, ya herpuin jobbie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get both at dndbeyond.com/marketplace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (exaggerated Scottish accent) What ya doin the weekend? Jings! You're a right hoodie dobber, ye are, pure walloper--oot yer nut!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: D&D Beyond is hosting a two-day streaming event this Friday and Saturday at Gamehole Con to benefit Extra Life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ach! Where are Jock Tamson's bairns? It's quality! I'm pure scunnered. (regular voice) I looked these words up! They're real.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both days will feature three, four-hour sessions from 7:30am-- 7:30pm to 10:30--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: a.m.!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All? Wow! From 7:30am to 10:00pm with special guests raising money for a special cause.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's throwing him that badly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [hat plays tinny, high-pitched "Scotland the Brave"]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. (exaggerated Scottish accent) Call me doonie, get on yer trolley and heed over to twitch.tv/get-fooked-ya-clatty-radge-wee-shite!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [hat music continues]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was not what I was expecting!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it ever stop?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (regular voice) I don't know when it stops!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help! Make it end!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't press it again; it'll start again! Maybe it's winding down. Ah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you know. We love London, we love UK, we love it all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My distant ancestry is extremely pleased with your performance. Thank you, D&D Beyond, as always.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is "to high doh?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "To high doh," to high, though. It means something? All these words are real. "Up to high "doh" means a lot? I don't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guide to Ravnica. The next episode of All Work No Play will debut this Friday at twitch.tv/criticalrole at 7:00pm Pacific. This week, Liam and Sam are building a custom MAME cabinet with Felicia Day and our fantastic Director of Events, Brittany Walloch. MAME cabinets, something I've been chasing my whole life, and finally there is one in my vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Felicia joins us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, both the standard and deluxe editions of our second art book, The Chronicles of Exandria, Legend of Vox Machina, will be on sale via pre-order this coming Monday, November 12, at 9:00am Pacific. This art book contains art from our fantastic, beloved community of critter artists. They've all put it together with love and joy and I'm super proud of it. These guys, like, died to get it done. The number of artists-- you guys did incredible work. We're excited for you guys to check it out, and super excited to announce, for our European critters, the art book will be shipped out to our brand new fulfillment center.in the United Kingdom that we just set up! A lot of hard work to finally get a fulfilment center that side. This will drastically reduce shipping costs and delivery times for our European family out there. Super stoked to have this finally functional. We'll have more details to that available on Monday morning when all this goes on sale.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I translate what you just said for our Scottish audience?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do I have a choice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to show off an image from inside the book. This is the standard, by the way. Matteo Scalera, an artist that I fell in love with reading the Black Science comic book. He's fucking amazing and the cover is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the standard?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the standard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy shit, that's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This book is so beautiful. Show that thing off and I'm going to find a picture.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is the beautiful deluxe edition which comes with a little ribbon and you can see this wonderful cover art with Vecna in the center and the four gods depicted in the corners all cowering before his might.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The four major deities that were involved in that final arc.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to show off a little Ioun. Look at this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who are these lovely kids right over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome back. Last we left off: The Mighty Nein, after making a daring escape from the Temple of the False Serpent on the island of Urukaxl had managed to nearly drown in the escape, make their way through the jungle being chased by both yuan-ti and the lizardmen denizens of this island. Making their way to the shore just in time to have the actual pirate ship, the Squalleater, there to defend you. Firing various heavy cannonballs towards the creatures which had given chase and allowing you to escape on the boats to safety. Upon reaching the top of the ship you found that the Mistake has been repaired enough to be seaworthy, though it does need some more intense repairs. Your supplies are relatively low, and it looks like the current goal is to find your journey westward to the island of Darktow which has been wiped-- from your knowledge-- wiped from the Clovis Concord's control many years ago and currently resides as the center of all piracy in the Lucidian Ocean. As you all went to rest for the evening, Fjord-- who will be here shortly, so I can continue to embarrass him-- had an evening's conversation with Captain Avantika, in which it was discussed his past history with his childhood father figure, who also seemed to have a history with Avantika as well and is somehow rolled in with this strange Uk'otoa phenomenon. It also came to light that this shipwreck which gave Fjord his powers might have a connection, based on the Captain's intuition, with where this third and final sphere may lie, and it was decided between the two of them that this may be the next goal, beyond Darktow, to pursue. After which, they fucked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (screaming) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While that era of the story is transpiring, I want to ask you guys, since we have a moment here--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're fucking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or in the loose, wibbly-wobbly, timey-wimey period of figuring things out as you recover from the intense return to the ship. What would you like to do? Is there anything you want to check up on? First of all, everyone leveled up to seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we get a long rest after?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be the long rest-- for everyone but Fjord, I guess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice. This isn't the next few days of our sailing adventure, this is that night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is that night. We will then begin to embark on what that journey will be, but if there's anything you wish to do before the evening's done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, that was all I needed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would try to locate Caduceus on the boat, actually. I don't know if he's hiding or not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm in my room because I was-- is this before Fjord came back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can say this is while Fjord is out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so I'm in my room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go to where he is on the boat and-- (knocking).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, Mister Caleb. Good evening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Battered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tired as I feel. Do you have a moment?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. What can I do for you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I come in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes. Of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was not a very good day. It's been a string of bad ones, in fact, and I am grateful to have you along with this group because we get hurt a lot and stick our noses places maybe we shouldn't. You have been very helpful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm coming to the realization that perhaps I was not entirely clear on what I signed up for, but I don't think that means that it's the wrong path. I'm getting used to the idea that it wouldn't be a test if it were easy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it your intention to continue on with us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I... I joined your group of friends-- I guess our group of friends, now-- as a testament of faith, and it would be a disservice to that faith to turn around because it's hard. If it'd have been easy, I suppose I wouldn't have been needed to be called to it. I've been thinking a lot about it. Jester gave me a lot to think about, to be honest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, sometimes acts of good faith deserve to be rewarded, when they can. I wanted to give you something that will make your time with us a little bit easier, I suppose. I start to pull the periapt out and untie it. This-- you know, I'm always so far back away from-- I hear you, Laura, in my peripheral, I hear you. I'm always very far back anyway, this isn't doing me much good, and it's better that you stay up more than I stay up because if you go down, that's it. This is a little bit of extra protection-- anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mister Caleb, do you believe in fate? There are lots of different kinds of fate; I know that's a heavy question, but do you believe that we are driven towards something by things that are greater than ourselves? (background music)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. I would like to think not, but I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are times that I think about the cruelties of the world and the things that have been put upon me and my family, and I would hate for that to be a plan, and there are times when, like today, I'm very grateful for being in the right place at the right time to make sure that the right people are becoming strong in ways they need to be. I don't think that excuses the pain, I don't think that you have to-- I don't know, I don't think that you have to not care about it or fight it with everything you've got, but I think the world is shaping you into something important, and I want to make sure that you get to wherever you need to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a pretty big matzo ball.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You won't have to work very hard at it, I imagine. I think just being you wherever the world puts you will do just fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you have this-- this is magic, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can tell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I help you, that makes it easier to help all of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I promise I will continue to help you all. Even when we're not the best of people, I feel like we're still moving towards something that's good and worthwhile, and I'm feeling the struggle's in my way to bring us to where we need to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome to the Nein.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm honored.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I feel like shit, so I'm going to go to bed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (chair scrape)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Meanwhile, one hour later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rolling them double ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to remove that item, and you get to add it to your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm adding which item?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Periapt of wound closure. It just feels right that it's with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Makes it harder for him to die. It was Molly's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go to Caleb when he gets back. (knocking) Caleb! Caleb! Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's my owl?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right! It doesn't drown, it's amazing. It's like it's magic or something. We had good times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have three or four more days, if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you do me a favor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pocketed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pocket owl. Right next to my bacon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: iOwl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you just see if it's magic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to know if this is something? Do you have a moment?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I will cast Identify on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not magical, it is sentimental.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, that's a feather. That's just a feather. It's good looking, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tie it to my staff. I'm not disappointed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not disappointed!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you good?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm-- bye. I'm going to go to bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I pull out Sprinkle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chittering and coughing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so tough, Sprinkle. I'm going to squish his little cheeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pees in your hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you. Okay, go right to your-- stay there. Don't drown, okay? Then I'm going to look for Beau, but she's not around, so then I'm going to go look for Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm drinking.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Where are you drinking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know where. Are we all staying in the room or do we have a couple of rooms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three rooms between the group, I think, that have been given to you and the people that have been moved to the Mistake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's say that I'm drinking on the deck of the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good. I was on the deck of the ship, too. How perfect. Hey, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi. Are you super wasted?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got a good buzz on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I have a question for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you-- I mean, I think you have because you said you were, like, into somebody before. Have you ever kissed a boy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the cutest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pretty cute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've kissed a boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah? What was it like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Excuse me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was it like when you kissed him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you never kissed someone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, well--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're related-- your mom is a master of sexuality--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was asking what it was like when you kissed someone. That's all!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because you haven't done it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I didn't know if it counted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, what was the situation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was drowning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you mean today? Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that count, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, I mean, let's take a look at this. Your lips pressed against each others'.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It meant something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did it make you feel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like I wasn't dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Alive. That is the feeling. Did it make your heart beat faster than, you know, being completely stopped how it was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think so. I mean, it's not dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I had to do my first kiss over again, I would want all of those things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! That's the best first kiss. It's someone you care about--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I didn't know if it counted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It means something. You'll remember it forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will. I will remember the after part of it, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was a little struggling in the beginning part.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, yes. Afterwards, I don't know if you felt this way, you just can't stop thinking about it and you just feel the soft pressing against you and almost taste him just for a little bit and it doesn't go away for a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think his tusks are growing back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You felt a little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a little bit of tusk!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! What was your first kiss like, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It wasn't as romantic. It was just a dare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With who?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Just someone. I don't even remember too much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's weird. You said you never forget it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sure did. It was just-- you know? I was pretty young and kids just saying like, "Oh, you "kiss each other and you kiss each other now." Just one of those types of games.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think kids do that sort of stuff a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so too, but I don't remember his name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Do you remember the softness of his lips?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do. Yes. It was a good day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, today's pretty cool too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, do you think things will change now between you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. I mean, he might have a big crush on me now, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you interested?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't know, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well. Sometimes, boys like-- Why am I telling you all this? Your mom's a lady of the night!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sometimes boys like it if you are a little bit aloof. A little bit cold to them afterwards like maybe they did something wrong and they don't even know what it was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, the play the games?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! Just a little bit of like-- just keep them guessing like "Did I say something? Did I do "something? Was I a bad kisser?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would put him on the defensive where you want him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then you cut his throat and fucking kill him! I'm just kidding about all that. I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Because I don't want to do that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Of course not! He's our friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Well, all right! Have fun with your flask, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go write in my journal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have fun drawing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As everyone concludes their evening activities, the journey, looking at the map and the distance, is about 800 miles to Darktow from Urukayxl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (intones theme from Pirates of the Caribbean)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, essentially. The ship normally--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jesus Christ!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should solve this at some point, right? We should get some bean bags or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably just rotate it. Maybe if you would roll it the other direction, it straightens it out. Did you know that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Put in under my-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys deal with your map. It's not mine. It's your map. Do what you want. Not my responsibility! Your ship is actually traveling faster than it normally was as part of the blessing that Avantika received. It can achieve about 55 miles--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An hour?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking at about 14 days of travel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To Darktow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Darktow, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 14 days?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to being on the open seas, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't have bullet trains in D&D. You have 11 days of supplies. There will have to be some sort of supply stop or a way of handling that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a thing called Create Food and Water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can mix it up with the normal food so it doesn't taste as bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singsong) Divine magic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Teamwork!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to stop then. All right, great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So sorry. We just burned an entire encounter like, "Yeah! Fuck whatever Matthew made."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is food and water the only thing we need? Do we need any other supplies to make this trip? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: During this time, a couple of things. One, you guys can decide to, if you want to, learn how to run a boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like that very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That being the case, we get to decide what types of skill sets you want to pick up on out here in the ocean. That being the case, we have the quartermaster. Quartermaster is the one who has the most authority other than the captain of the ship. They take over if the captain is unable to. They divvy up plunder or whenever you board a prized vessel, they decide what to take and what to leave. They generally helm that whole process there, as far as pirate ships are concerned. There is the navigator or the sailing master.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dibs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have Orly hired to do that for you, but Orly can also train one of you to be a backup in case Orly--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say anything like being able to go by the stars or otherwise is something I might be able to do very well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can overlap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do have memory--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know which direction is north at all times. I don't forget anything. I'm real smart in-game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just in the game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the master gunner who organizes the placement of shot, powder, the fuse and aiming the ship's cannons. All right, so, Nott's going to want to train as the master gunner. And, of course, powder monkey, which is the next one below who basically runs all the stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Powder monkey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Powder monkey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe I'll apprentice as that first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone'll learn a little bit about sailing as you go, but start getting an idea, if you want to right now, which one of those you'd want to specifically begin to focus on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does the boatswain do again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Manager of the ship. Like the office manager, right? Keeps it running?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, makes sure that all the canvas, the ropes, the wood, everything's in good condition.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have experience being a quartermaster, so I'll do that as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said quartermaster, not boatswain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll do the boatswain stuff? I feel like I'll be really bad at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, actually, to that point, the next morning, as everyone begins to go about the first real day out here in the Lucidian Ocean, clear blue sky with dappled bits of cloud around you, the smell of sea salt and foam and spray making its way as it splashes across the front of the bow, Avantika catches up to you with Vera being called up to the side. She goes, "Vera, if you'd be so kind, I would like to call-- let's say the utmost members "of the crew, please, to the deck. Maybe some of your friends as well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course, I'll bring them up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all gather on the deck, Avantika goes, "I appreciate all of the hard work you've "put into this, my crew and yours. As we are making our way back it is important that we properly "balance as we endeavor here and make sure that both training that has been inquired about is "properly disseminated, and, out of curiosity, and with no disrespect to you Vera, I will be "replacing you as the ship's quartermaster until we return to Darktow with our Captain Tusktooth." Vera looks taken aback and briefly offended, and then, "But of course, my captain." "Quartermaster, "time to start paying attention."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She begins to divvy out responsibilities to the rest of you in the various positions that you requested to start learning. Some elements of the journey have you moving over to the Mistake, some have you moving back, especially for the repairs elements, whoever decides they want to be the carpenter. Unless none of you want to. That's up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm strong, maybe I should be the carpenter!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got no.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that cooper position? Barrels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes and maintains barrels.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, you've been around barrels your whole life!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I already know how to make a barrel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to be the boatswain?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was thinking the one where you actually have to go out and find supplies. I might be really good at that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the boatswain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take the boatswain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'll do the carpenter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. Note that somewhere on your character that those are the positions you're training on this journey. All right, cooper, got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Making barrels.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm the gunner! Well, the powder monkey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Powder monkey for now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For now. Working my way up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few days into this journey, we'll say because you're training as the carpenter--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, the Mistake is keeping in time with the Squalleater and you're brought-- it slows down a bit and you're brought over to the opposite side and there, looking around, you wander under the deck and find, at one of the tables, Waldok, who's one of the deckhands of the ship. He's currently sitting at a table with a large tankard of really rough grog or ale, biting his lower lip, and he has his sleeve pulled up and you can see Orly has this unique bowstring of some kind that's wrapped between two fingers, an inkwell, and a needle that's tied up in it, and he's currently halfway through doing this really good-looking, elaborate tattoo across the arm of this deckhand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got his patch over his eye, right up against one of the portholes where the light's coming through and he's using it for perspective, and he's lording over this smaller, thin human, and glances over, "Oh, hey there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go stand over his shoulder and stare at what he's doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you keep watch and he's doing this curled mermaid that is coming up and, on one hand is holding on at the hip and the other is picking a fruit off of a tree. You begin to question the design a bit and Orly says, offhand, "It's what he requested."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are you having a mermaid pick fruit if she's in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's sitting there going like, "(grunting) Well, I had a rough fight with some scurvy a few "years back and a few things I like the idea of ladies in the sea that can save me from scurvy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's really smart. It's very meaningful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orly chuckles under his breath. It's very well done, and you can see now the other tattoos that are across his body were probably done by him on himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Orly, I'm training to be a carpenter, did you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wasn't aware, actually, but m-m-maybe you should ask around for the man who's doing the "repairs around this place."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I will definitely do that, but I also want to learn how to do tattoos. Can you teach me that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can try and teach you some of--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a really good artist, Orly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- m-m-my skills. However, I got a specific talent with some of this here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a thing that you wrap around your fingers and then you go like this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kind of. Here, do you m-m-mind?" The guy's like, "Uh."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a really good artist, don't worry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure?" Orly helps show you how he threads this and gets the needle set up. Go ahead and make a performance check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeez.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Performance?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Performance. Oh no, performance!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say dexterity, if you really want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll do dexterity. Oh, 17!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Picking up where the initial partial ink sketches were, you actually continue to fill in the rest of the upper torso. You do a very good job. You can see where the style does shift in the art, but it's not abrasive, it just continues, and it is rather nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think maybe your mermaid would want some googly eyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Um, no. I appreciate that, but no."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure? I think it'd really make her look really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orly puts his giant tortle hand on your shoulder and goes, "I don't recommend m-m-messing with the artistic vision."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand. I don't want people messing with my artistic vision, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There you are."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You and me, Orly. We're going to be fast friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like the idea of that. Point of order--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you say "porn of order?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Point of order."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't happen to have any sort of gem dust, do you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gem dust. Like a gem that's been powdered?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or like ink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I have plenty of ink. It's m-m-more--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, are you trying to make a sparkly ink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "M-m-more or less."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I don't have any powdered gems, but I could probably powder some gems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I picked up this technique years ago from some of the individuals that spawned from the "legacy of the island folk. It allows me to instill a m-m-mighty ink spot." As he does that, he flexes his arm and the tattoo shimmies every so slightly and his muscles bulge a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Will you teach me how to do that if I give you some dust?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "See, it's not so much something that can be easily taught; more that it's something bequeathed "by an elder."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to bequeath me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you really like me, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll see how time goes by. For the time being, just let me know if I can be of service." He talks to you about it and he gives you an overview of his capabilities. For different types of gem dust, he can imbue somebody with a series of tattoos that can alter elements of their physical self. It's not inexpensive, and each person can only have it once ever, so it's not like you can have multiple. For 2,200 gold worth of a ruby dust he can imbue a permanent +1 to strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? (exclamations)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are all the different gem types there. He can also imbue certain resistances. Those are more expensive, those are 5,000 gold worth of fire opal dust for fire resist and 5,000 gold worth of black sapphire dust for cold resist. He has the capability of imbuing essentially magical, permanent tattoos.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a jeweler's kit. (pigeon cooing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau made jewelry. (pigeon cooing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a shit-load of jewels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot of jewels.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have some, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we have some.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some stuff that we don't want to get rid of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want some magic tattoos!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, do they shimmer, though, do look sparkly on your body, do they look shiny?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see aspects of, based on what enchantment it is-- like on Orly, his is specifically an aquamarine dust. It has this faint, aquamarine, light blue shimmy to it; as soon as the light hits it, it glitters across.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aquamarine dust being the one that boosts charisma.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Orly, you're so charismatic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(laughs) M-m-many folk have said that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would definitely want to learn this from you, and I probably, once I get a little more rich and I have some powdered gems, I'm going to have you do it to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, looks like you're just going to have to keep me employed for quite a while."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, don't get hurt, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't get me hurt." He goes back to finishing up the tattoo on the individual.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, what was the guy's name that was getting a tattoo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was Waldok.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Waldok. Well, Waldok, I'll see you later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(grunts) Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go carpenter some stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roughly eight days into this journey, you've moved about 100 miles off the shore of the southern island of Bwuali when a small horn sound goes off on the Squalleater. (horn call) It's a small horn. It's a very small horn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had a flashback.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. This wasn't meant to be an epic horn that I totally failed on. This is intentionally a small horn. Glancing at the top, you can see Avantika has climbed to the center of the mainmast and towards one of the crow's nests up top, and, looking down, points to you, Fjord, and goes, "Quartermaster, call two of your compatriots that you trust to the top with me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will do! Jester, Deuce.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Up top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I like it up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys climb up the mainmast to the crow's nest, and there you see Avantika with a spyglass, and she leans in to the three of you, directing mainly towards Fjord, and goes, "Now that we are at sea, I want to show you something." She pulls out the spyglass and holds it over to you and helps you point it in the direction. Here you see a vessel, a little ways off on the horizon. A little bit north of where you are, a northwestward direction. She whispers over your shoulder so the rest of you can hear. "Glancing at this ship ahead of us, it appears to be a Concord ship. A shipping vessel probably carrying trade goods. It appears to be equipped for rapid travel, but we could head it off. As my quartermaster, I ask you for your opinion. What should we do?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't want to stray from our path, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take a look. What do you see?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use the spyglass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're torturing orphans on the deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on the path it's heading southward, it's either going to arc around to Tal'Dorei or be heading in the direction of Marquet or possibly, if it's feeling risky, the Shattered Teeth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Captain, are you in a habit of intercepting said vessels in your time at sea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most, I'd say probably 80 percent of encounters "out here, is just intimidation. Most let us take what we want and continue on our way. They don't "want to die."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's important that you know in my previous life I had encounters with pirating vessels as well and most of those experiences I did not enjoy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, to be fair, there are plenty of assholes on these waters, so it does not surprise "me. But it is your choice, I say. You may talk amongst your friends, but there is opportunity."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You say no need for a loss of life?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not unless they-- how do you say-- they are stupid?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or stubborn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Either or."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, my fellow boatswain and navigators to be? Nope? Boatswain and carpenter? Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a carpenter, Fjord. I'm learning to be a carpenter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, carpenter and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a really good tattoo artist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A boatswain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take real good notes. What say you on such a dangerous expedition as this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yes, of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a look at this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You make out the same details as he does. Nothing catches your attention. Nothing about it seems out of the ordinary per se, but it does seem to be a vessel that is filled with its payload and making its way south.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me see!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only because I would totally do it if they were both looking and I rolled like shit. I think there's a ship!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not wrong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my initial thought.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, I don't know. I'd be okay with it, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're up for a scrap on the seas?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it doesn't have to be a scrap like Avantika said. It could be, you know, go in and take stuff but maybe we could also give them something!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would we give them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, like new names or pretty drawings?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine art.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we could just make it a fun time for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "An aggressive trade. Interesting."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is your decision?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As long as we abstain as well as we can from violence and as long as your men in the crew understand my disgust at such tactics, I think we can make our way towards an intercept.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as this playful look on her face as she watches this discourse turns into this extremely intense, Joker-like grin and she goes "Well then, welcome to piracy my friends. Come." She jumps off the side and heads the ropes down and begins shouting off commands to people on the ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that escalated rather quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She made me question what we just did. I thought it was one thing and then her face made me think it's a whole other thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you said we need supplies right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I said that we were in a position of disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I felt like your words were different before. Listen, we're going to not use violence all right? I'm not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sails shift as the ropes are being pulled--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do me a favor. Spread the word amongst the rest of us and make sure the rest of the crew hears as well. I don't want innocent blood shed if it can be helped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, whatever, Fjord. I guess we can do that if you want to. I don't care.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm already down. I'm not there anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like this is somehow connected to your previous bad decisions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. Is the big ogre--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bouldergut?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, that name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, Bouldergut is on this ship. She has been moved from The Mistake partially because Bouldergut acts as a bodyguard to Avantika and because the other ship itself is in serious need of repairs. They assume probably don't put the giant heavy ogre on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I find Bouldergut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure enough. Bouldergut is down there currently getting ready with a giant great club that is carved from an older masthead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bouldergut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure that is just for show, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. For show."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's important you understand I have an agreement with the captain. No unnecessary bloodshed. You will make sure that the rest of the men know this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks back and Avantika goes, "Oh don't worry. You are the quartermaster. You are the one "who is to be boarding any sort of ships that we encounter so you choose your people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (uncertain noises) I know. Making sure you know. That is all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In my imagination that felt vaguely like a threat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point you watch as Ipess, who is the second mate of the ship, this sunburned gnome begins scurrying up the rope to go ahead and put their flag on display. Ipess. I-P-E-S-S.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What does the flag look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flag on this is a dull gray purple color and it has a similar sketch of the same eye tattoo that Avantika has on her chest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As that goes up and the ship begins to move to intercept, glancing through the eyeglass in the distance you can see the other ship noticing the approach and there is now a bunch of chaos as they all begin running up and down the ship notifying everybody else on there. What are you doing to prepare, guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm running to find Nott, our master gunner-in-training. I'll say: Nott? I need you to keep an eye on those guns we're not looking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) All right you motherfuckers! I need hollow charges loaded! I need extra fuses on every motherfucking cannon! Get me hollow shells loaded with extra charges. I want four cannonballs on every cannon! Move!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott! Nott! Oh my god! Look. Again, we're not looking to sink this ship, okay? We're going to try and board, get what we need and let them go. I don't want unnecessary violence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run in with a keg of black powder that I've been building. (shouting) Are we fighting?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Is this a fight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Light them up! Load them up! Put the charges at the ready!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Who's trying to punk our ass?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Short fuses!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The angry, tough red-bearded dwarf that actually acts as the cannon master of the ship that goes by the name of Ophiscan Duth. "I'm interested in possibly getting involved, but this is too much fun to watch. Keep going, goblin, I'm liking it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) If you're not going to help stand out of my way!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I've got five pounders, eight pounders, 12 pounders, short fuses and a 20 pound keg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of the other deckhands who act as powder monkeys are also helping get things organized.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we doing? What's going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're doing great. Beau, you're going to join me as we pull alongside the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're part of the boarding party. Go up above.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott? I pull Nott close and I say: If you fucking fire on that ship before they fire on us you will never get into the Academy. Do you understand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Academy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're not fighting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The letter that I have that grants me access?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want that for Caleb--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't fire on them unless they fire on us, you understand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Though I would recommend if you're going to fire do a warning shot. Tends to get them a bit "spooked in their boots and slowing down."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So a warning shot's okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Across the bow, not at the ship. In front of it, away from it but just enough to show a "little bit of power."

lines.name: SAM

Amongst all the various bits of general supplies, cloths, clothing, and silks that are specific to the Menagerie Coast, there are some elements of Empire goods as well that are put in there. But the thing that catches your interest: there is one last addition. Everything else seems to be written in one type of handwriting, and there is a different type of handwriting in the final entry, and the final entry says, "Requested package: guarded," and the amount that was paid for that was 1,800 gold. That was received by the captain on this ledger to keep on the down low.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Eyes wide, the pupils gyrating in a very quick, shaking motion. "I don't his name. He came "with one of the pieces of cargo. He just stays down there."
