lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, looking inside, it is lightless and appears to be empty aside from the series of crates and shipping containers that are in here, other than the ones that you've had moved up to the top. Between the three of them, they've done two quick up-and-downs. They've brought a fair amount of supplies so far, and they'll continue if you tell them to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't see shit, but I don't trust it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, maybe if I readjust. Let me just close my eyes for a second. Okay, why don't you try?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, can I give it a better look with my darkvision?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you spent your turn helping her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right, I'm helping her. Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically it's both of you looking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Caduceus aired the fact that he is a little nervous, so I place my hand on Caduceus' shoulder and then look through Frumpkin's eyes to see what's going on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm getting a little bit of magic down there, I don't know what it is, but it's making me nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking through Frumpkin's eyes, make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I wasn't trying to do a perception check. I'm not searching for anything, I'm just checking in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just keeping an eye? Okay. So you're just keeping tabs on the situation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's exactly what I want to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to let it known that I'm asking for a volunteer from the other crew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need a volunteer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It can be anyone, but there should be at least one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The captain steps forward and goes, "For what?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For a special present! It's a treat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds awful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A treat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go, Lieb. That way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Liam?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lieb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lieb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, so close. One of the deck hands looks and he goes, "What, me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Onto The Squalleater?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Come sit next to me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes across the gangplank over next to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bust out the tattoo stuff that Orly's been teaching me. I'm going to give him a tat while all that's going on! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the darkest timeline. Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unmolested, except for--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's how I got this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do you want it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having bad flashbacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just like, "I-- what?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll be so good. It's going to be so beautiful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This poor guy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got to test on somebody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I like it! Let's get your clothes open. While everything's going on, I'm just going to spend--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you're prepping, he just looks over at the captain very mournfully, and the captain's like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just going to be one smiley line with two tusks sticking out of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vampire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've been abducted-- no, by Captain Tusktooth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, you've been abducted, congratulations.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! 19!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So over the next ten minutes or so, you'll be able to provide a fine tattoo of that simple design.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, just like a smiley face, but with tusks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. He's biting his lip (groaning).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just deal with it, it's going to be good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make my way forward into the hold even though we haven't seen much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You move ahead into the hold about ten feet or so. There's a small pathway that's built between all the different elements of crates and barrels, making sure that you can get to the back of the hold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plug! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not a sponsor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, not sponsored.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you move around the corner, in a flash, you hear (grunting). You see this quick arc of steel as suddenly, from around the corner, a fairly well-armed man with sun-darkened skin, short hair pulled into a tight top-knot or a bun of some kind, holding a longsword two-handed, swings at you, three strikes. That is 24 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 18 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, ooh, that is a 26 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three hits there. That is 16 points of slashing damage, 13 points of slashing damage, and, oh, 18 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I call out up there: Captain, your quartermaster is under attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you know that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's looking through Frumpkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika listens and goes, "Ah, I trust he can take care of himself, eh?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to send me down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now I need you to roll initiative, you to roll initiative, and roll initiative for Yasha, and I'll do for Bouldergut.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, Gil, but I don't trust you. 18. I'll take that 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20? Beau, you're 18?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, so Yasha's up first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's up first. Yasha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he look armored?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Armored? Yes, half-plate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With her bonus action, she will rage and she will make two attacks with the Magician's Judge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not good. That's an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 misses. The blade scrapes across his armor, no impact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one scrapes across the armor, causing a couple sparks to fly and briefly lighting up his position. The second time he actually pulls the longsword up and manages to parry and cause the blade to completely miss, impacting and getting stuck about an inch into the wood before she draws back angrily, gritting her teeth. That ends Yasha's turn. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to come up and I'm going to parkour off of one of the crates and I'm going to try and come down and I want to nail him in the temple and try and do a stunning strike. First, I'm just going to try and hit him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While I'm doing this, I'm going to be like: Frumpkin, help! Okay, 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I actually want to ask Frumpkin to do something from on deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll initiative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she get advantage on barrels because she's a cooper?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm using my elbow. Fucking balls, why does this keep happening to me? Five points of damage on that first one, and I'm going to do a stunning strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was out of the box there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It needs to be garbage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has a pretty decent con, but he only rolled a 15.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, yeah, he saves on that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, wait. It's my proficiency bonus plus my-- because I was afraid that I had been fucking this up-- plus my wisdom, which is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's eight plus your proficiency bonus plus your wisdom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (counting) 14. Nope, it's still 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the first strike hits him across the head, but he manages to resist it. He pulls back (grunting), teeth gritted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pop, pop. Do it again. First hit, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits. Roll damage for the second strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bullshit damage. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said his con was good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. It seemed to be pretty decent; he rolled a 15 on that one. But you can try it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One more time. Ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another ki point. That is a 12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's stunned!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First strike, no impact, he pulls back. He's rearing to try and deflect, or at least keep you at bay. The second strike, as you crack right across the side of the head, he goes down onto one knee. You see him, his eyes go wide as they're rolling a little bit in his skull, and he's currently trying to shake-- You rung his bell. You still have your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My bonus action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, if you're--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, he's stunned! Yeah, that's an 18 to hit, a natural 18. And another goddamn one! Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage. He's stunned and on his knee.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to look at Frumpkin again and be like: Caleb, if you're watching, I don't trust Avantika? That's probably all I can say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end Bouldergut's turn. It's now Frumpkin's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin is going to fly over towards this gentleman and try to, with talons, rake across his head. With advantage because he's stunned, yeah? That's a 15 or an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Vampiric Touch through Frumpkin's touch, and he takes 3d6 necrotic damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Frumpkin can attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is eight points of necrotic damage to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can wifi suck HP out of somebody like that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just turn to Fjord and go: Frumpkin listens to my commands!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Frumpkin's go. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will stand up after having getting the holy fucking shit knocked out of me from those longsword shots, and say: Friend! You better be real sure this is something you want to die for. I would suggest you drop your sword. You're outnumbered. I will take a step back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check. Because he's stunned and beat to shit, I'll give you advantage on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First one was a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn. Yasha's up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will walk up and attempt to grapple him into a bear hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an athletics check for her with advantage because she's raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's grappled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently being held by Yasha and looking right over at Fjord, who's backed away, hands up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to get answers from you. It's your choice if it's going to take us beating them out of you, or if you just want to give them to us. So I'm not going to hit you. Just know, if I feel like you're lying to me, I'll punch the living shit out of you, and then you're going to tell me what I wanted to know anyway. Understood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It comes to his turn, he's being held by Yasha, and he shakes off the daze. Grits his teeth, and just throws his sword to the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not murder monsters!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Our dark-leaning thing goes tick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's still clutching him there. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Friend. Ow! Second, we saw a little manifest that said there was some guarded parcel down below. I can only imagine that they were talking about you. Now, my friend was correct. She can punch the shit out of you. Also, we can see how well you want to swim. Or, we can just make sure that you're on this boat, healed up a little bit, and sent on your way. And you can create whatever story you want. But I do need to know what you were protecting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still being grappled by Yasha, without saying a word. There's this look of defeat and acceptance of one's pride. He's just trying desperately not to engage more than he has to, and glances over towards a crate that is across from where he was sitting that would still be in his visual perspective. But it's an unsuspecting crate pushed in a cluster of others. He looks in that direction and gives a head nudge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I move to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before I open it, I'll look at him and go: Is there a trap in this damn thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin lands on his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you're lying to me, I'll slit your throat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I think he's lying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start heading downstairs to see what the commotion is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like googly eyes on your tattoo? Or would you just like smiley face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever you want. Please, just let me go."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Googly eyes it is. Thank you very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I open the crate very carefully.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about maybe that big. It's about the size of a shoebox, if you will, but it's really well-scrolled and carved wood. Like a whittler or a carver spent a lot of time to make it look very beautiful and presentory.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull that out of the crate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has these chain handles on the sides that dangle on the edge. It has a little latch on it, and it's locked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's locked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's pretty light.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Frumpkin, if you're listening, can you have Caleb tell Nott to come down here, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As soon as Caleb felt Caduceus walk away, he dropped Frumpkin's sight because he didn't want to be smacked in the face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, he'd pat you a couple times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But Frumpkin will listen to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The captain on the stop says something like, "Are we done yet?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nearly there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at the guy. Is this trapped?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't believe so."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (spitting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I really wish you hadn't done that. I can't guarantee her reaction to that will be a positive one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying real hard right now. Like, so hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you are. You've done really well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've already guaranteed I lose my job and my wage. What more can you take from me?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you being paid to protect this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "150 gold upon my return."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll give him 70 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just slip it into his pouch?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll walk up and put it in his pouch as Yasha's holding him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks confused and untrusting, like he's caught off-guard by it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're trying real hard, man. Like, actively trying real hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Soma."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Soma. See, now was that so hard? Did that take you being fucking rude?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just glares at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you coming down under?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I probably am getting down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, hey, Cad! Will you go get Nott?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, while you're here--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa. Wow. Someone did a number on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry. Would you mind helping this fellow out and giving him a little love?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might do both of you. Hi. It's a pleasure to meet you. I get the feeling you're having a really bad day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, jeez. I'll go get Nott.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start doing a little healing on both of you. Take a few minutes while you guys figure this out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. He rocked me. I miss raging.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Prayer of Healing on both of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there you go. Nott, Beau catches up to you on the other ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stand down, men. Are there any men standing near me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two of the other powder monkeys that are currently playing cards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stand down. At ease. Wait for my signal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14 points up for you. 14 points up for him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Frumpkin really likes me. We had a bonding moment. Frumpkin took care of me and protected me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that it is true because I think his thoughts and he thinks mine. We are the best of friends. He's the best cat that any man could ever have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, bye. And we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we going? What's going on? Oh my gosh. Is Fjord dead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. (whispering) But we found someone and something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While we're waiting for them, can I pick up his longsword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look at it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty well-made.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still, by the way, have my Detect Magic up. Am I getting anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is Prayer of Healing concentration?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I would have had it when I came in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you came in? Yeah. The source of magic was that box.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, is that box glowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: By the way, I suppose I would have said: That box is definitely magic. I'd be very careful with that. Yeah, let's be gentle with it. Was it Soma? Mr. Soma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Soma."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did you get this gig? I was just curious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm a hired protector."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, do you work for anybody or do you have a deal with somebody? Do you like who you work with? Seems kind of a rough gig.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is when people like you come in here and ruin it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair. This is just odd. I mean, I imagine being sent with something I didn't know anything about by god-knows-who, that will leave a mind to wander. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'd be surprised how much of an industry revolves around just that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's taken aback even more. "I will say, you are definitely the strangest pirates I've ever "heard of."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sort of a reluctant piracy at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know the half of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We like to have fun at our job.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We like everybody to walk away feeling as okay with everything as possible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure you understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He nods begrudgingly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice plate armor, by the way. (clicks tongue) It looks expensive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was." He looks over at the back part of it that's been smashed to shit by the ogre's greatclub.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I toss the box to Nott. Catch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! What is this? What am I doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Careful with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you want me to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We want you to open it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?! Oh, Jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to take this on our ship and let them be on their way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if it blows up? I don't want to blow up our ship. I already did that once today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (pigeon cooing) Magical traps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, obviously it is magical, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Step back. Are there any alcoves or closets or chests around here or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of crates in the vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll open a crate and put it inside and then move back and use Mage Hand to try to open it or check for traps with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Checking for traps, you have to get close and inspect it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well then I will check for traps first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is trapped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How trapped is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a fairly complex trap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mechanical or magical?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mechanical.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So is the magic not coming from the box? Or what was inside the box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather it's probably what's inside the box. You could attempt to disarm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I attempt to disarm it with Mage Hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's what Mage Hand can do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so back up, everyone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get some distance here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cover your eyes. Cover your ears.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, you got to admit. I bet you're pretty curious what's in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Yasha's still clutching him there, he's like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep everybody okay. I'm going to get a little distance and I'm going to go outside the room, just in case. Mr. Fjord, I would recommend you get some distance as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will take that advice and join you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a thieves' tools check, please, with your dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the gentle Mage Hand, clutching the thieves' tools, begins to do this weird ghostly finger dance across, you see it go (clicking) Ting! You hear a spring break. As the Mage Hand shockers the box, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Nott) Almost got it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One in the pooper! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the spring break on the interior and it seems the trap has been disabled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it worked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: SAM; Open!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was disabling the trap. Now you have to open it. Roll to unlock it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's still locked. With thieves' tools? 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three locks. There's one lock in the front, and two on each side. Rapidly, they come open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. I want to go look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go to open it up and the inside, it's soft, velvet interior of the case. There you see a small ceramic pot of some kind, roughly about that big, that has a lid on it, and it is enclosed. Then above it, mashed in there, a paintbrush. About a foot long.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A foot-long paintbrush and a little pot of paint.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little pot of paint, it looks like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not going to touch this. We're going to take these to our friends who know what to do with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard glances over and goes, "This is bullshit. This is fucking bullshit."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, that you were--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were paid to carry this around? Do you think it was a prank? Were you pranked by a friend of yours or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want to talk about it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Caleb is going to maybe want to take a look at that later. I would recommend hiding it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In a complete attempt to capitalize on your disgruntled feelings, would you mind telling us who paid you to guard this, or where it came from? This paintbrush?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've already given you too much. Let me go amongst my pride swallowing."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel really bad about this. Can we throw him any money or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We already threw him money, which means you're going to tell us who paid you. Come on, man, don't make us do this the hard way. We're trying to be good. Who paid you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (deep breath) Come on. What was the agency you sub-contracted from? I know how this shit works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Normally, some of the higher-paying jobs are a don't-ask-type scenario."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've been more than flexible with our questioning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is very true."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we won't mention to anybody that we threw you a little cash. I mean, obviously, that doesn't need to travel, and, you know, whatever you need to do to maintain. I understand dignity is a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As well as the fact that you spit in my face. I'm going to leave that here. We're going to cross out these doors. None of it happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah! Do you want us to do that? Like: Ooh! Ah! You got me in my kidney!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just giving the thousand-yard stare into a shadowy corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I actually do feel that way, so let's just head up. We'll head up above.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Bouldergut stops and turns around toward him and pats him on the head, and then follows up behind you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we should leave these people with most of what we-- I think this has been enough. I don't want to, you know, cause any more trouble than we have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree. Do you want to make sure everyone's feeling all right before we--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anyone else need some healing? Anything real quick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Captain Jules Errog says, "No! Would you please leave us, if you have everything you need?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lieb! Get back over to your ship! You're going to miss it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (panting and whimpering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go go go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, nothing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He runs back across like, (panting).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I made a friend!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach over and-- Come here. I pull his shirt aside. Did you do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has been marked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) (whimpering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's rare.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for your hospitality. I am glad that we could complete this transaction peacefully.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The captain gives a nod. "Thank you for sparing the lives of my men."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We will take it back over to The Squalleater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we're walking over, I whisper to Fjord and I say: Avantika's going to want the paintbrush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Avantika's going to want to know about that paintbrush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ship begins to move. You begin continuing to head westward. Once you're a little bit out of earshot and Avantika's keeping an eye off the edge of the ship, looks back to the rest of you and (slow clapping). The rest of the crew begins to clap and there's a bit of applause. "With that, my friends, welcome, truly, to what it means to be free on the "sea. I'm proud of you. So! Let's see what you found." They go to start opening the chest, and we'll take a break there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boysie. I'm hiding the little pot-thing, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but Bouldergut was there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bouldergut saw everything, so unless we want to bribe Bouldergut--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that when we come back from the break!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to pee, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I'm dying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everyone. The winner of our fantastic figured myrtlewood dice vault.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Myrtle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations, CaptainCupcake!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pirate voice) We'll get that sent to you right rickety-split.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (parrot voice) Captain Cupcake!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (parrot voice) Captain Cupcake! (realistic cawing) Sorry, too much! Reeling it in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Having now made your way on the Squalleater from, as far as I know, all of you, your first real bit of piracy. Pulling away, the chest that was brought on-board is currently being picked and opened by some members of the crew. (thudding) As it folds open, looking inside, you can see it is a mass of gold, silver, copper, and an occasional glimmer of platinum coins. This is quite a bit of change. At which point, the captain looks over to the quartermaster and goes, "Well done. This will be divvied up appropriately. What else was found? We've got some--" and then begin to point out the food, the thawing tropical fruit that was placed there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Bouldergut to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bouldergut's sitting there with the rest of you, looking around and listening to the captain, looking off into the distance. Maybe ten feet from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stilted) I have to go check on the cannons downstairs. I'll be back later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Minus three. Ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 12 on insight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The captain glances past and goes, "Eh, why don't you stay here, at least until we're finished divvying up all the findings."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course, Captain. I am at your beck-and-call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're telling me. All right, anything else? What transpired below? You have not told me what happened. Apparently, there was some sort of a scuffle?" and Bouldergut goes, "(deep chuckle) Yeah. Tiny man in armor." You begin to realize, at this point, not a whole lot of timbre difference between the male and female ogres that you have encountered in your time. It's generally just more hair on the top of the head-- stubble's about the same.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed, there was a man in full plate armor who got quite a few shots in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One less pirate and one less shipper trying to prove himself a hero. Thought he could stand up to the lot of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is impressive. Did you finish him off?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we didn't kill him, but we definitely embarrassed him thoroughly, something that I find some men find worse than death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm impressed, you are all very strongly adhering to this not-killing aspect of piracy. I can tell you from experience, it does not last very long, but I respect the intent. Anything else?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I heard there were some very good tropical fruits, super rare, in this crate. Based on what I found, (clicks). Good meal later on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we keep the sword? I don't remember.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did, yes. I kept a memento. I hold up the longsword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks at you, "Hmm, not bad." Bouldergut leans in, right over your shoulder, Beau, and goes, "What's the--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I slip her 30 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bribing the crew in front of the captain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not-- I'm trying to-- Oh my god, are you serious?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's a seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's still not great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That brings me to an 11?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a one or a seven?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it is a one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is a one? Nope, it's a one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clang, clang-clang.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach back, your coins slip from your grasp, and (clattering coins) all across--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking hole in my pouch. Shit, how did that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bouldergut goes (grunts) and starts helping you pick them up, but fumbling with her giant fingers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. Good show everybody, everybody great time. Just wanted a round of applause.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Captain Tusktooth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go Captain Tusktooth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. Quartermaster Tusktooth, formerly captain for us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyway, it was a good day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start doing a little more healing on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika gives a keen look towards Beau, nods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Captain Avantika?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, Jester?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like a tattoo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I already have plenty, but thank you, I appreciate the offer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you want any more, or if you want any of the ones you have improved, just let me know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's continue on to the Dragshallow Reefs. Come on."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (running feet pattering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you hiding? I chase after Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch up to Nott. Are you going as well, or is it just you two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going downstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are people doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm asking: what are people doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We act casual.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stay up to entertain Avantika.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I, sensing my biff, casually I turn to Ipess and say: Hey man, great work down there. How great was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You as well. It was very impressive."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So impressive, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You beat the shit out of that man."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fucking-- right? Saw that adrenaline pumping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could tell that. It was very nice, well done."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyway, good day, man. I go downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You too. Goodbye."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head down, obviously tired, and just go follow you guys to take a nap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone else doing anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm following Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trailing them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bring that fucking wizard down here with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try to find Caleb. They do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you find Caleb. Caleb, if you haven't left the top of the deck--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I've been exactly where I was. Do you want to know more about my cat? Because you walked off before. The funny thing about a cat is that they are very persnickety but with the right person, they are not. Frumpkin with me, we are just so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Genuine question: have you been telling this story the entire time I've been gone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that would be-- I'm a very intelligent person. That would be foolish. I don't talk to thin air. Also, some people say that they have nine lives, which is funny, because we--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's great. You know what? I have something I think that you would be deeply interested in, maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you find books?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't. Fucking, goddamn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot to look too. I did too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't find fucking books.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a long shot. We are on the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, books, cats, I get it, that's so good. Love your fascination of both the most boring things that I can think about, including books and cats. But let's go look at something awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You thought it too, didn't you?

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA, MATT
lines.text: (singing) Books and cats and books and cats and books and cats...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. You're telling me your love of higher learning, I understand. Did you need something? Because you clearly don't want to hear about cats, so we could end this now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just keep your mouth shut for like 30 damn seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you find?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Follow me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you find?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We bring him to them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you find? What was it? What are you hiding? I want to know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we? Let's get into our rooms. We're going to go into our cabins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you go to your chambers.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hi! Nott's hiding something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping a close eye on what's going on, this is very-- they're being so sketchy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha pulls in, "What is going on?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shh, come in, shut up. Did anyone follow you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The captain can be invisible. She might be in this room with us right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasping) Let's all walk around, walk around the whole room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's you. That's you, Nott. Okay, hi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) That tickles.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we feel anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That would have been so awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (impact) (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Shank shank shank! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (wailing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's what I got! It's a magical paintbrush!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do the thing. Figure it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Identify it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Should I draw with it? Should I do something with it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can talk now? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Just not about cats and books.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will still help you. I need a moment, so I set it down and start scrawling on the floor around it, and about ten minutes later I have--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the meantime, I'm like: Oh my god! So, what happened? Is it like a tattoo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! It was amazing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When are you going to do a tattoo on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The full box? Are you inspecting the full box?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I mean, if they put the box down in front of me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I opened the box. This is the paintbrush and the ink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a big box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The box is about shoebox size.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's the size of the item contained within.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not giant or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caduceus detected magic, and it was glowy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a lucky find.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I'm saying, so I need to figure out what it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, that's a big old thing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a novel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need time. It's a long piece of paper. It's a lot of knowledge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Long spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you talk amongst yourselves for one minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you want a tattoo of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you think it-- Oh, a tattoo, if we could pick any tattoo?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trecorum Satis Dee?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trecorum Satis Dee. You're welcome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean, what physical attribute would we increase, or what would you want the tattoo to be a picture of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, what do you want a tattoo of, like a picture of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've had an idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For just a little bit. So this is going to be stupid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're not, fucking--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Not there! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Not There Fairy? Not there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Flying away!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cousin of the Metagaming Pigeon, the Not There Imp. Not There Fairy, there you go. Don't forget, Nott, you still have that marble, silver shield thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, can he do more than one Identify at a time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take time to do it a few times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's endless, but it takes ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. You mean, the shield?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shield, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have this idea, because Molly, on the back of his coat, his neck, his tattoo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He had it in the tattoo and the coat, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the back of his tattoo, he had an all-seeing eye, and I just, I don't know, I thought it was really cool, I feel like it could be cool to have it on my back, right below my neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Molly would like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I don't know, maybe it was really sacred to him and he would be really super offended by it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, maybe it would, like I stole it from him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's fine, I'm sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you know, he's dead, so, what's he going to do?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, you can roll a d20 and if you roll a 20 I'll tell you what Molly would have thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll do that later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any news, Caleb?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sit down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is your lucky day. This is very dangerous to give to you, but you are the perfect person to have it, so of course, well, here it is, it is yours. This will allow you to paint things and they become real.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! I was so hoping for this!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Almost anything. Nothing too fancy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Isn't that an old Chinese folklore, a magic paintbrush?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is some Bugs Bunny shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the magic paintbrush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like the "Who Framed Roger Rabbit" warehouse?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah.
