lines.text: It's four o'clock!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like five or so; you're like an hour or two from dusk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just do our jobs. I've got a cannon to fix.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to make some barrels?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, can I speak to you for a moment? Above deck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you go about your business?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will follow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a nap. Taking a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha does the same.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stand at a distance looking over the rail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away is she? We're in broad daylight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm like, you know, far away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six, seven feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just looking out, looking, drawing, I'm very distracted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just dicks dropping into the ocean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (splashing) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far away are you, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think 15 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seeing where Jester is, I'll pull Caleb aside. May I ask you a frank question?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course you can. I scan around for Avantika.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. That is a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking about, across the deck, you do not see her currently near or visible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your tone, your opinion of what to do with Avantika in order to make sure that we're okay, it seemed very... calculated. Very... risky. Do you mind me asking if you've-- Have you ever sacrificed anything in order to achieve a greater goal? Because I feel like I am swimming in the deep end and I don't quite know what I'm doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Used my wits, understand my surroundings. I wish I had half the courage he did. I don't know. You know, I think traveling with all of you has emboldened me some. I was alone for a long time and ran from everything. I like this group and I enjoy traveling with you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Likewise. You don't miss much, do you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've always been like that; I have a very good memory. I remember everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have a very shrewd sensibility as well. You seem to be able to weigh pros and cons in an equation, a scenario.

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Math brain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like a fool much of the time. I'm glad you think so highly of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. I don't mean any of it as a critique, but more as a compliment and I'll add with it a request. Keep that eye of yours on Avantika for me. I don't entirely know what her intentions are, but I feel like there are only a few that I could ask to exercise quick judgment in a moment of need.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start nervously twiddling a wire in my hand absentmindedly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you know what I mean, but in case this thing gets out of hand, can I count on you to right the ship if need be?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep the group safe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As always, I will do my best.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you and thank you for talking with me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cough very hard into my hands and cast Message to him and briefly, quietly say: I think that woman is going to try to kill you, I really do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Just so. I'll turn and walk off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (coughing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need some water, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, do you have some?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uh. (pause) I create water in my hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, you can do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I receive it. There's not much left. Most of it spilled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll keep creating it in your hands as you drink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can create water?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When did that happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've always been able to do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this a custom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Just keep drinking. Keep going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few more days' travel to Darktow. A couple of moments here. In one night that you are in your room sketching your book, testing out some of your new paints, you feel a hand on your shoulder. You glance over and you can see the pale, soft fingers and a dark greenish sleeve resting there. You glance over to the side and you can see the draping hood and the slight curved smile across the angular chin of the Traveler protruding from beneath the cloak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello. I see you found a new toy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have magical paint!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well I'm quite excited at the things you're capable of, Jester. How are things?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're pretty good. Did you want me to make you something with the paint?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Surprise me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Um, Traveler?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, my dear?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you having fun on our trip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I've been... pleasantly surprised."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're pirates!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know, your tenacity is impressive."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We stole things, but they gave something back just like you always teach, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maintain that balance. That seed of chaos."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Traveler, how do I make a boy like me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well there are many different enchantments that could achieve the goals you seek."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if I want to do it with an enchantment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Trickery?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If that fails, there are plenty of enchantments that can sway his mind."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, right? You'll help me out with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll do my best."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not jealous, are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll always be my number one love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know. So what are you making me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want it to be a surprise for you, I can't tell you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll wait."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm glad you're here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm never far."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a surprise!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) What are you making him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh gosh. Oh my goodness. Okay, with my magical paint-- Oh gosh. I was planning on fucking up some other things, but right now I will make a little shrine, like a little statue of the Traveler, that way I can pray to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It almost seems to fall a centimeter and center itself. It goes from a two-dimensional shift, it's almost like blinking--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want him shimmery green.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sitting up from the edge of the bed, the cloaked figure walks over and lifts it and inspects it and places it back down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're getting better."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could leave these around other places? What do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Preferably where it would be the least expected."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And the creepiest to find."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm excited."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got to get to work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can make so many of these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Make me proud, Jester."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The time's coming soon, we'll meet the rest of your brethren."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, I wrote it down! It's soon, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) The rest of your brethren?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, in like less than a year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Soon, my dear."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there like an Advent calendar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look up from your notes, closing your book, you turn to look and the Traveler is gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the first we heard that, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Less than a year?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I wrote down the date somewhere, I know it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We heard that before, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys don't know anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Private conversation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe two days out from the reefs you go to bed that night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Oh shit! (background music)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Down, down, you sink. Until you see a structure coming to view from below. A tilted tower, wrapped in sea vines, the hollow center providing a wide tunnel further within. You peer inside this empty tunnel of the tower's depths and watch as a sudden bright, yellow light shines from within: a gleaming yellow eye. "Reward." As the two other lights seem to try and drift towards you, behind you, you fall into darkness and the dream ends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. I wake up and immediately grab the map.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, queen, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The wettest dream.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking triangulation shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blow me into Bermuda.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because we were over here, right? In the reefs? Uk'otoa?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, Urukayxl, and we've been heading towards Darktow, so we've been coming across-- did we pass the wall? Coming in this direction, did we pass--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, you passed south of it. Your piracy stunt hit right at this trade route there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, if it's a triangulation--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would there be one there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, this is where we're going, technically this is the shipwreck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where we're going, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? This was where we were.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's where we were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where you were. The three masses were not even in shape and size, and they were clustered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's another reef here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then there's Torrid Reef here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is, and then dead center is a lot of space. You could say that this is the center, but-- okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are any of those places close to your shipwreck that you know of?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, the shipwreck is here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this triangle of? Where the three objects are, or where the three temples are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, in the vision the three land masses are in a triangle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know in which direction the ship was heading?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the time, from what you recall, the ship was heading outward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so it'd be heading west.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe he knew where to go, and he was heading there to get his gift.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Said Beau in a morning breakfast conversation or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Anyway. Contemplate this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll be doing that later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the next few days that pass, eventually the fog rolls in and the blue, cloudy skies you have become familiar with on this journey give way to gray, rainy, and cold, this marine front rolling in as you begin to come upon the outskirts of the Dragshallow Reefs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt? Before you go on, can I just real quickly steal a bunch of gunpowder, while I was learning how to be a powder monkey?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did have days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you do know that the current master gunner is keeping a very close eye on you after you have exhibited--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm talking like a pinch here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shawshank style?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, little pinches at a time. I don't want tons, I'm not trying to steal a barrel, just enough to make one of those bangy arrows again, just enough for the tip of an arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Black pepper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to be trying to construct a explosive arrowhead at some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome, go ahead and roll for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've successfully secured deez nuts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I doing? Tinker's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be tinker tools, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could make a sneeze arrow, in theory.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it, dex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With this one, it would be, yeah, dex, since you've already made one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Yeah, you manage to construct a pepper arrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If someone's allergic, they're fucked, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pepper bolt, there you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When life gives you pepper, make pepper arrows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship skirts around the southern edge of the reefs. You can now see the tangled graveyard of destroyed ships and gathered driftwood marking the shallow spots across this jagged cluster of reef. Curving around a southwestern passage, a channel, that opens. The channel beckons you entry as you turn to head northward to what would be the center, the heart of this cluster. No more than maybe 20 minutes into entering this channel, Avantika shouts up at the rest of the crew, "Raise "the colors!" at which point the massive ogre, Bouldergut, tosses the gnomish second mate, Ipess, high up to the central mast, to the crow's nest, where he swaps out the flag to a new one, one that is straight purple. As it begins to push its way in, make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the flag just solid purple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've seen this before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a different flag than the one that was raised during piracy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, so what's the total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20, not natural.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten for Fjord and 19 for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20 with a total of 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Jester, it's a couple of things. You pick up on the detail of the flag. It is straight purple but there is something... different about it, you're not entirely certain. It looks like a straight color, but there's, sometimes, some of the way the light hits it, you can see a sheen in parts of it. That's the best I can describe. The rest of you also look around and you can see amongst these reefs, not only are there the jagged bits of it that come forward and bits of rock that jut out the ocean amongst the rest of the rubble around, and it looks like a lot of it has been placed both as a communal barricade on top of the reef, and as a challenge to anything that wishes to come in, but you can see in areas where the rock itself is a little more sturdy and above the surface, there are watchtowers, and there are bolt-throwers and catapults, and there are defenses all across elements of this reef that you imagine are one of the many reasons it's not been taken back by the Clovis Concord in what you would know to be the 40-plus years that Darktow has belonged to what is known as the Revelry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Revelry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Revelry is the communal band of pirates that work together to maintain some internal order. Make a history check, Fjord and anybody else proficient with history.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Revelry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord and Caleb, you know that this began as a dispute with the heads of the guilds in the Clovis Concord. They own and run a majority of the trade routes that come in and out, but a lot of the smaller shipping businesses and various other side-industry leaders were being over-taxed, repeatedly, in an attempt to close them out of the business and essentially completely own all means of shipping in the vicinity. This pissed off a lot of people, and eventually, in moments of combined desperation and frustration, they banded together, and where Darktow was previously a very important repair and stopping station this far out from the Menagerie Coast for long-distance shipping, they ransacked it and took it over. They killed those that defended themselves, and any of those who did not want to raise arms would be absorbed and be allowed to become a member of what was now called the Revelry. As such, they have since held this location and continued to be the source of piracy both for their own wealth and continuation of well-being, but also as a continuous source of aggression and destruction of the otherwise very prosperous trade that the Clovis Concord runs. You do know also that the Revelry is run by what's called the Plank King.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds super inviting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This mass of natural-looking, hive-like pirate city there stands before you. Welcome to Darktow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Darktow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the ship makes its way to the docks and eventually comes to a stop, you can see a few figures up there at the edge, one of them that rings a bell as it comes in, and a couple that come out to meet Avantika. Steps out, and there's a couple of hands raised, and go, "Hail, "Avantika!" She goes, "We have returned! I know it has been quite a while, but success and "celebration, I believe, are on our lips tonight." A few of the men come up and look over the crew and look over a few of you and take some notes, and then dart off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Guess we're part of the island now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we off the ships yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship now has docked, they're beginning to take remains of the supplies, the Mistake is pulled off onto the other side and Orly and your other hired crew are looking very wide-eyed and confused about what the fuck is going on. You literally hired a bunch of guys out of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They didn't sign up for that shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nicodranas that have now been brought into a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A month-long journey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to step off the ship--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill those guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi steps off with the rest of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Counts it himself. "Our business is concluded." Looks to the rest of you. "Be careful around this one. Be safe." He turns and walks into the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I liked him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dead man walking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Complicated feelings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to get on my hands and knees and kiss the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is salty with sea splash and cold to the touch because of the nature of the stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought for sure Caduceus was going to give Jamedi a little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He got away quick, yeah, that was not a good time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one talked to him over the journey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he was on the other ship. I guess we were switching back and forth between ships?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have been resolute and Uk'otoa will be proud."

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tonight we drink! Come. Let us be off to The Bloated Cup. The rounds are on me."

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: The Bloated Cup.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marius comes around the edge of the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (nervous voice) Hi Marius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, Marius!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of the docks. Yes, remember Marius?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. He's like "Okay, don't mean to make this really-- Where the fuck are we?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're at the end of the world, my friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a pirate. Ta-da.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (nervous sighing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to be time for you to toughen up a bit. Do you have a pirate face?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really good. That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a pooping face or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Both, really."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, well, until you find a better one, that'll do. What's your pirate name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What should it be?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Marius the Mariner. LePual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Got it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Le--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, there's more."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: LePain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "LePual LePain."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: LePual LePuain. I don't know. That's all I got.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was really good. Do me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Caduceus the... Juices?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like juice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orly's big turtle hand clasps on the back of your left shoulder, Beau, and goes "Oh, I kind of "like that one."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I like juice."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yay. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Orly the Swirly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (unsure, uncomfortable humming)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teach me how to do tattoos that are fancy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait, what?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make me your apprentice. Make me your-- bequeath me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to need a drink."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we'll follow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gallan, who has recovered and is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fellow carpenter!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Who has become loosely the-- because he's the only one who was originally on the Mist and knows it well-- he's become the den mother of the other hired crew you've brought into this wiley adventure. He comes up and goes, "So. All these ones."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's the plan?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we say there was a plan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm, do we live with plans?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not sure. Did we have a plan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had a vague idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We hired them for a certain amount of time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We should probably let them go home eventually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't even really remember who they are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, to be fair, we should let us go home eventually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Maybe they should stay on the boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After it's repaired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Then we will take them home eventually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't we need to pay them more?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I think we've brought them to a port of great business. If they choose to stay here, they certainly can. Otherwise, they'll have to wait until we're leaving again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll ask around." He doesn't seem bothered by it. He's been here before. Gallan left this port on the Mist. But he seems genuinely-- Over the travel, he's gotten a little bit concerned and seems somewhat invested in the new crew you've hired. He goes and relays that message to the rest of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just scared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoops.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the meantime, the rest of the crew seems to have followed suit with Avantika, leaving a few crewmen that are just a part of the docks to keep watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How guarded or patrolled or monitored are the docks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the bread and butter of their business.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In this area, are there uniformed patrols or do you just see well armed--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Muscle is obviously everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense here, and based on your history checks, everyone who resides in Darktow is a member of the Revelry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is packing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, you guys are members of The Revelry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So by touching down on the island, you become a member.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, by becoming part of Avantika's crew, coming into port, and having a few individuals mark your presence, you imagine that's probably the case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're a part of The Revelry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to follow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to be following the people who have been here before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make sure the crew knows that they should be repairing the ship and we need to be ship-shape at some point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if that was the easiest membership I've ever obtained, or the most difficult membership I've ever obtained. It's kind of hard to say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Following up on Fjord's question, or Travis' question, the muscle that we see around us, does it look like it's-- are we in Deadwood, or is there a strong police force of sorts that is making sure that shit is not going down constantly?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Something they would wear that would identify.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, is there anyone in charge, or is it just a saloon with cowboys everywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more the former than the latter, from the first part. There is no uniformed guard, there is no--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're not wearing a hat or a sash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is golden age of piracy Barbados, basically. We're in the thick of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the heavy realm of piracy has only existed for 40-plus years, on this coast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wow, okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still, in some ways, finding its footing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh lord! We all going to die! We'll tell the crew they can have the evening. They can have the evening, we've just been at sea this whole time, but in the morning, we expect work to continue on The Mistake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably the only rule here is "Talk shit, get hit."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grayish curled hair that goes right about shoulder-length. It's slicked back, probably with his fingers to one side, but it's oily enough where it stays in place. Looks like he's wearing an officious coat, and they're currently in the middle of a discussion, and she looks over her shoulder to the rest of you and goes, "Ah, my "apologies. There is one bit of business we must attend to before we can celebrate. The rest of you "continue on. My new compatriots, it seems," and the human figure pipes up and goes, "Word has "reached the ears of the Plank King that you've brought new blood here to Darktow. I imagine these "are the new blood based on," and he looks at a sheet of paper that's handed to him and looks at the description that was written, "and he would appreciate you bringing them to The Throne Roost "and have an audience."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, who are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I'm the assistant of the Plank King."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "James Tybalt."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: James Tybalt. Assistant to the Plank King. Do we need to bring any presents or anything to the Plank King when we meet him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm certain he wouldn't argue." He smiles now. This is the first time you've seen his grin and there's, maybe, six or seven teeth. Most of them are blackening. "I'd recommend y'all follow me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, sir!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You too, Avantika. He wants to check in." She sighs but gives a smile. "Ipess, bring like "500." He starts counting out gold from one of the chests they had brought with them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We never divvied up that box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we didn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's for her to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: TRAVIS. No. For me to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the quartermaster.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's for the quartermaster. He said divvy up treasure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what quartermasters do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Balls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it was intentional, guys. We're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. The coin is passed over to a smaller chest and Avantika carries it up under her arm. You guys are led to the western side of this city and then begin climbing up this precarious set of winding stairs carved out of the rocky cliff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Above the city, slick with mist and recent rain. It looks like the way the wind's hitting, the rain isn't hitting the cliff side, but you can see it passing maybe 15, 20 feet in front of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is precarious, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Partway up this climb, the occasional torch is now replaced with a wooden pike holding a skull or a head at varying stages of decay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hear rain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put my metal, scary mask on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you put your metal scary mask on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You feeling at home there, Deucy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stone stairs themselves vary from two feet wide to maybe a foot at times. Looking down over the edge, you can imagine a few folks have found their end with an odd misstep. The stairs finally stop at a wide stone shelf that overlooks the town at about 200 to 300 feet above, the furthermost edge ending just above the rocky waters of the inlet. A cave mouth greets you against the cliff, warm with firelight. Two watchmen notice you and they stand there keeping an eye as a cloaked man pushes past you to descend from where you came. He just pushes past you. Avantika nods to the guards and shows the chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The guy that pushes past, what's he look like? What's he wearing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a little ways past you now. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't just let these guys go by!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was just a dude!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika continues in after showing the chest, the offering. The rest of you follow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is our offering, too. It's all our offering.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Long black curls toppling along the sides of his head, past his shoulders, framing his face to about mid chest. Now, you know this through your research and some of you had experiences, for the most part male goliaths don't have hair, let alone such luxurious locks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: European, British giant shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourself awkwardly having to sit on them as they creak with your weight. Another bowl of nuts and somewhat mushy berries is placed in Caduceus' hands, a bottle of wine is opened and handed to Caleb. "My manners, where are they? "(chuckles) I am Wyatt Marinas, the Plank King of Darktow, master of the Revelry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All hail the king.

lines.name: TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: All hail the king.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hear hear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you are?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. We are part of Avantika's crew, but humble servants in her adventurous adventures. I am-- some call me Gilligan, others other names. I present to you this dried meat of the harpy as a present for you. Harpy jerky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sets it awkwardly on one of the arms of the stone throne. "Okay, Gilligan. So, Avantika, it "seems you took all of these under your wing." She nods and takes her chest and puts it forward and goes, "That is true, and I believe the rest will introduce themselves here in another moment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm the Little Sapphire. I lift up my-- I'm the Little Sapphire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunt of acknowledgement)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, my name is Philip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm Beau. Some call me Tracy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm Fjord Tusktooth, quartermaster of the Squalleater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They call me Clay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha just goes, "I'm Yasha." "Well, you've all come under the banner of the Squalleater. What "draws you to a life of piracy? What drives you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So much!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What drives any of us? Necessity. Urgency for a better life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ships are really cool. We like to steal things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Disdain for organized crime in the Empire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I serve nature. I'm a maker of fine graves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't get away from it! Ooh, doggy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, is this required? Refugee from the Empire, looking for better life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks to Yasha. "I like to punch things?" Kind of smiles. Looks back over his shoulder, "You've got all that, Linus?" And you see off to the side, in an alcove you weren't looking, you see a man, hunched over, who's currently writing everything down in a book, and sketching, and he's paying really close attention to everybody, and is listening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You draw too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stenographer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to show me some of your drawings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recognize, he's drawing as well as making notes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to, definitely, every time he looks over at me, pose differently, so that he gets the best--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. "Well, if the captain here vouches for you, then I trust you won't go causing any "trouble. Only law here is no trouble coming between pirates while within the reef. You cause "trouble on land, I judge you. You've seen a few judged on your way up here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did? Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Trouble outside the reef, well, you'll either return to explain your cases, and I decide "what's fair, or in need of punishment, or if you don't return, I just assume you're guilty. Them's "the big ones, you understand?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does this just include harming other pirates, or stealing from them too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depends on what the other one thinks. If the other one doesn't want to be harmed or stolen "from, well, that's breaking the law."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if the other one isn't around to lodge a complaint?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You all sorry lot, you've certainly shacked up with one of the craziest lasses of the Swavain "Islands, that's for sure."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's crazy all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A damn dream-chaser, she be. So be warned where she leads you: she's crazy. Fucking nuts."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought that the entire time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks up at him and goes, "You are quite the peach yourself, there, master." Squints to himself. "Well, thanks, that's it, shove off. Get the fuck out of my room."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I just ask, this Linus person over there, are they just writing everything down that we say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's glaring over at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gibberish) (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should take our leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess so, we're going to go just enjoy your fine place now, thank you for having us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have a favorite cocktail at the Bloated Cup?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or a favorite spot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A brew, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I have my drinks brought up here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, course you do. All right, bye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Avantika leaves, the rest of you are leaving. Takes his arms and pushes you out, leading you to the exit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just the Plank King and Linus in that room, outside from Avantika?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's metal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It puts the lotion in the basket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's some metal shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around the interior of the chamber, because the way this is carved inside the mountain, it's this nice arched cavern top and there are number of alcoves and hidden spaces, and you glance around it and first, at just a quick glance, notice at least six or seven other figures that are hidden in the alcoves, just watching.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Creatures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Figures. Seem to be either human or--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roof snipers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) Statues.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're all being ushered out of the chamber and pushed to the side, the Plank King is like, "Anyway, off with you! Enjoy your night, drink well. We'll take care of that," and there's a little tug on your arm, Beau. The Plank King comes and whispers in the side of your ear. He says, "You've a keen ear, right? Avantika ever does anything untoward to our little community "here, you let me know. There's some grand coin in it for you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just backs away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I yank away from him. Move on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a snitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I that transparent?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said, "How much?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You sit in the bathroom stall with your legs raised, with a notebook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you make your way out, back to the stone steps. Avantika sees you all exit and goes, "Well, that was harrowing and necessary, but over. Now for drinking, yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. He seems like quite the benevolent leader.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's certainly a series of adjectives, yes, I'll give you that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long has he been in a seat of rule?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well over a decade, probably."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much on average do you pay him to not kill you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well, it's not paying him to not kill us, it's sharing in our spoils to better the community."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And if you didn't share your spoils?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I've never tried."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has beautiful hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's awesome, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very. It's lush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nevertheless, I'm going to get drunk. Who's with me?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hear hear, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, come on." She smiles and turns around and you all begin to make your trek down the somewhat slick stone steps to the darkened city of Darktow, the glittering firelight, the open windows below leading you to whatever revelry the evening has in store. And that's where we'll pick up next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells) Oh god, we're on pirate island!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did this happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so cool, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You a stole a ship and followed the path!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're surrounded by a reef and artillery and pirates!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were going in a completely different direction and now we're pirates!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's wearing somebody's scalp, you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a war on another continent, and we're not a part of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so proud of you all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will say this, though: In comparison to these folks, we're not so bad. We're not that bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a point of comparison, this is true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're in the main of other creatures.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, we're the heroes here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good shit, Matt, good shit, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well guys, this is a very unique flavor of campaign.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Plank King is cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (wolf whistle)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the fucking hat! [music]
